name: Yanone: Letter Splatter
description: Yanone immerses you in a quirky environment where the fast-paced action requires you to be on your guard at all times. Pop the balloons and watch as your world fills with colors to celebrate your success. It doesn't get easy - as your skills improve over time, this game seeks to continuously push you out of your comfort zone and bring new challenges to the table the longer you survive. Can you make it to the end of the game?
